description: Example texture generation configuration for Minecraft

textures.name: sand_cartoon
textures.prompt: Transform this sand texture to a cheerful cartoon style with warm golden-yellow colors, simplified grain details, and a playful sunny appearance. Keep the grainy sandy texture but make it more vibrant and child-friendly.

textures.name: mud_cartoon
textures.prompt: Convert this mud texture to a cute cartoon style with rich brown colors, playful wetness highlights, and a friendly appearance. Simplify the texture while maintaining the muddy character.

textures.comment: Example with multiple reference images - blend styles from 2-3 textures
textures.name: custom_stone
textures.prompt: Create a new stone texture that combines the color palette from the first image, the crack pattern from the second image, and the overall texture style from the third. Make it cohesive and cartoon-friendly.
